page.title: 07CURRIE GARDEN CENTRE
page.content: There are two garden centres in our area.One of them is owned by Mr.V. Mr.V also owns a shop which sells garden accessories. He grows all the plants himself. To work at the garden centre you have to study horticulture. Mr.V's job is to supervise the work which is done. He attends to customers and answers the phone as well. Mr.V is very experienced, he has worked at his garden centre for thirty-two years now. The garden centre suffers badly from break-ins and vandals who steal plants and smash the glasshouses. The shop receives around 500 customers a week, and is busiest at weekends. The busiest time of the year is from March to June. Mr.V employs sixteen people. Three work in the shop,five in the garden centre and eight work in the nursery.Of the sixteen workers,ten are part-time staff.
